text: Choi Soo-In (born March 5, 2004) is a South Korean child actress. She first came to the attention of the public with her debut role in the 2016 film The World of Us, where she plays a lonely and outcast child who tries her utmost to hold onto her first friend. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
